name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Principal Engineer with 13+ years of robust experience in **Cloud-based solutions** and **Microservices** within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in delivering high-performance applications utilizing **Java**, **AWS**, and **Azure** alongside expertise in **CI/CD** processes and **Distributed systems**. Adept at implementing **observability** practices and applying **system design patterns** to meet compliance-driven development standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

Skilled in advanced technologies including **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with a strong foundation in both frontend and backend frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing, leveraging **MLOps** tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Demonstrated leadership capabilities complemented by strong communication and analytical skills, focused on metrics-driven development and fostering innovation.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented **cloud-based solutions** leveraging **GCP** and **Azure**, ensuring high availability and scalability across multiple regions.
• Led the development of **microservices architectures** that promote distributed systems, enhancing system resilience and facilitating continuous integration/continuous deployment (**CI/CD**) practices.
• Developed robust CI/CD pipelines using tools such as **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, incorporating best practices in observability and metrics-driven development to monitor performance.
• Executed system design patterns to optimize architecture for new projects, applying analytical skills to assess risks and make informed decisions.
• Championed a culture of observability within teams, implementing monitoring solutions that enable proactive detection of issues and improve system reliability.
• Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, enhancing communication channels and ensuring alignment on project goals and deliverables.
• Mentored junior engineers, promoting leadership skills while fostering an environment of continuous learning and innovation.
• Delivered measurable improvements to project delivery timelines by **30%**, utilizing Agile methodologies and employing best practices in project management.
• Drove the successful adoption of **observability** tools, resulting in a **25%** increase in the team's ability to diagnose and resolve critical system issues.
• Established key performance indicators (KPIs) related to system performance and team productivity, using data-driven insights to support project decisions.
• Participated in stakeholder meetings regularly, providing updates on project status and actively seeking feedback to align with business objectives.

Leveraged **Cloud-based solutions** with an emphasis on **Azure** and **GCP** to create scalable architectures that support high-demand financial applications.
Utilized **Microservices** and **Distributed systems** principles to redesign core financial platforms, enhancing scalability and efficiency in handling over **1M** transactions daily.
Implemented robust CI/CD pipelines to automate deployments, resulting in a **40%** reduction in release times and improved system reliability.
Cultivated a metrics-driven development environment, utilizing observability tools to monitor application performance and identify bottlenecks, achieving a **30%** improvement in response times.
Demonstrated leadership by mentoring a team of **10+** engineers, fostering best practices in software development and design patterns.
Facilitated effective communication across multiple departments, driving collaborative efforts toward achieving company-wide technical objectives.
Applied strong analytical skills to troubleshoot complex system issues, ensuring system uptime of over **99.9%**.

Led the design and implementation of **cloud-based solutions** leveraging **GCP** and **Azure** to optimize system architecture for scalability and reliability across a global e-commerce platform.
Directed the development of microservices using **Java** to ensure seamless integration and functionality of key components, achieving a **25%** reduction in transaction latency.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines to streamline deployment processes, enhancing team productivity and increasing deployment frequency by **40%**.
Established observability metrics and monitoring strategies to track performance and reliability, ensuring systems met operational targets and minimizing downtime to under **2%** annually.
Engineered distributed systems capabilities to support architectural resilience and fault tolerance, critical for high-traffic workflows and supporting up to **500K** simultaneous users.
Fostered a culture of metrics-driven development, mentoring teams in best practices for performance tracking, enabling data-driven decision-making for ongoing improvements.
Utilized system design patterns to craft robust solutions that accommodate business growth and changes in technology, ensuring adaptability and longevity in the architectural vision.
Enhanced cross-team communication and collaboration, aligning engineering efforts with business goals and improving project delivery times by **30%**.
Demonstrated strong analytical skills in troubleshooting complex issues, identifying root causes and implementing innovative, effective solutions in a timely manner.
Cultivated leadership within the engineering team, driving performance evaluations and career development to ensure high levels of engagement and talent retention.
